doc.name: PtidesPreemptiveEDFDirector
doc.description:
Code generator adapter associated with the PtidesPreemptiveEDFDirector class. This adapter generates Luminary specific code.
This director starts a task for each actor. Each task has a specified name, stack size, priority and function code to execute. User can introduce annotations in an actor to specify these values. In particular, this adapter class looks for the "_stackSize" and "_priority" parameters and use their values to create the tasks. If these parameters are not specified, the code generator uses the default value 80 for stack size, and 0 for priority.
Each task executes a given function which consists of the actor initialization, fire and wrapup code.
